title: DigitalFreedomTech
author: DigitalFreedomTech
content: We’re a VPN company looking to hire back-end developers.  We’re talking about server setups, maintenance, and developing new in-house systems.  Good Linux system administration is a must.  Understanding of Python will help.Please email me, DigitalFreedom@skiff.comI won’t waste your time, I legitimately am looking to hire

comments.author: alen88
comments.body: Hello,I'm interested. I sent you a mail
